message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its features and value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than what I had in mind. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? I'm confident you'll find this to be a fair price.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to accept $17,000. I would like to make one final counteroffer of $14,000. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.
